tools.chempiler_setup module

tools.cmd_execution module

:mod:”cmd_execution” – Command dispatcher and deep control layer for the Chemputer

  1. 2017 The Cronin Group, University of Glasgow

This module provides a class that takes possession of the physical resources via the various module executioners, and carries out commands supplied as a list of “opcode” and arguments. This is the heart of the Chemputer control.

For style guide used see http://xkcd.com/1513/

class tools.cmd_execution.Executioner(graph, simulation=False)[source]

Bases: object

Judge. Jury. Executioner.

Parameters

  • graph (ChemOSGraph) – Graph object representing the physical platform_server, populated with module objects

  • simulation (bool) – Whether or not this is a simulation

execute(cmd)[source]

Executes the command, depending on the operation move that is passed

Parameters

cmd (List) – List of arguments for a command

get_device_objects(flag)[source]

Goes through the graph, grabbing the objects that held in the nodes depending on the passed flag

Parameters

flag (str) – Flag identifying what objects to retrieve (Pumps, Valves, Stirrer, Rotavap, etc.)

Returns

Dictionary containing the name of the device and its associated object

Return type

device_dict (Dict)

Raises

Exception – No objects found

join_parallel_operations()[source]

Joins all parallel execution threads before processing a sequential command

process_camera_cmds(cmd)[source]

Processes a command involving the camera

Commands are: [SET_RECORDING_SPEED]

Parameters

cmd (List) – List of commands

process_chiller_cmds(cmd)[source]

Processes a command involving the recirculation chiller

Commands are: [START_CHILLER, STOP_CHILLER, SET_CHILLER, RAMP_CHILLER]

Parameters

cmd (List) – List of commands

process_pump_cmd(cmd)[source]

Processes a command that involves the pumps/valves Commands are [MOVE, HOME]

Parameters

cmd (List) – Command arguments

process_rotavap_cmd(cmd)[source]

Processes a command involving the rotavap

Commands are [START_HEATER, STOP_HEATER, START_ROTATION, STOP_ROTATION, LIFT_UP, LIFT_DOWN, RESET, SET_BATH_TEMP, SET_ROTATION]

Parameters

cmd (List) – Command arguments

process_stirring_cmd(cmd)[source]

Processes a command involving the stirrer plates Commands are [STIR, HEAT, SET_TEMP, SET_STIR_RPM]

Parameters

cmd (List) – Command arguments

process_vacuum_cmds(cmd)[source]

Processes a command involving the Vacuum pump

Commands are: [INIT, GET_VAC_SP, SET_VAC_SP, START_VAC, STOP_VAC, VENT, GET_STATUS, GET_END_VAC_SP, SET_END_VAC_SP, GET_RUNTIME_SP, SET_RUNTIME_SP]

Parameters

cmd (List) – List of commands

process_waiting_cmd(cmd)[source]

Processes a command for waiting on the platform_server

Parameters

cmd (List) – Command arguments

wait_with_feedback(wait_time)[source]

Waits for a desired time and prints the wait progress.

Parameters

wait_time (int) – Time to wait in seconds

tools.constants module

:mod:”constants” – Global constants file for easy maintenance

  1. 2018 The Cronin Group, University of Glasgow

This file contains all constants used in the Chempiler project, such as dictionary keys, device types, and so forth. Keeping them all in one file makes future maintenance a lot easier and avoids duplicates.

For style guide used see http://xkcd.com/1513/
